briefTitle: Decision Impact Study of PreciseDx Breast
officialTitle: Prospective Clinical Utility / Decision Support Study of an AI-enabled Digital Breast Cancer Test (Precise Dx Breast, PDxBRTM) to Predict Early-stage Breast Cancer Recurrence Within 6 Years
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Decision Impact Study of PreciseDx Breast on treating Oncologist
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Invasive breast cancer (ductal / mixed ductal-lobular)

Exclusion Criteria:

* Prior history of invasive breast cancer
* Neoadjuvant therapy
